It's taken me 2k hours to realize this game is terrible. Match making is completely broken, even with Prime, and any hope of you having fun is completely thrown out the window. You're ranked with people that are sometimes 8 ranks higher than you and you'll have games where it doesn't even matter playing. You're supposed to lose. Don't bother playing this game between Midnight - 6am EST as the amount of potheads and drunks will only ruin your experience that much so.

Don't play this game.
